models.title: GPT-4 & Large Language Models
models.description: State-of-the-art transformer-based language models powering advanced natural language understanding, generation, and reasoning. Applied in healthcare documentation, business intelligence automation, and AI-powered consulting systems.

models.title: LLaMA 3.3 70B
models.description: Meta's open-source large language model with 70 billion parameters, optimized for reasoning and action (ReAct). Utilized in AI agents for document building, business analysis, and intelligent decision support systems.

models.title: Healthcare LLMs & Medical AI
models.description: Specialized large language models designed for healthcare applications including clinical NLP, radiology report analysis, medical terminology scanning, and personalized oncology treatment prediction. Integrates with FHIR standards and clinical workflows.

models.title: BERT & Transformer Models
models.description: Bidirectional encoder representations from transformers enabling deep contextual understanding of text. Applied in business requirements analysis, document classification, sentiment analysis, and knowledge extraction from unstructured data.

models.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash
models.description: Google's multimodal AI model combining vision, language, and reasoning capabilities. Optimized for fast inference and cost-effective deployment in production environments, supporting real-time analytics and intelligent automation.

models.title: Medical Imaging AI & Computer Vision
models.description: Deep learning models for medical image analysis including X-ray classification, CT scan interpretation, and radiology workflow optimization. Supports diagnostic assistance, anomaly detection, and automated reporting for healthcare delivery platforms.

models.title: Predictive Analytics & ML Pipelines
models.description: End-to-end machine learning pipelines for predictive modeling, forecasting, and decision support. Implemented using Python, Spark, and big data tools for business intelligence, supply chain optimization, and personalized recommendations.

models.title: Real-time Object Detection (YOLOv8+)
models.description: Latest generation YOLO models for real-time object detection and computer vision applications. Applied in quality assurance, inventory management, and automated visual inspection systems with edge deployment capabilities.
